org.gatorgradle.internal

Class DependencyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gatorgradle.internal.DependencyManager

  • public class DependencyManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Checks for, and (in the case of GatorGrader) downloads, installs, and configures dependencies. The standard dependencies to handle include: -- GatorGrader from GitHub -- Python version 3 -- Pipenv -- Git
